meanings.sent1: I will transistorize the old radio to make it work better.
meanings.sent2: The technician will transistorize the circuit board for improved performance.
meanings.sent3: I tried to transistorize my shoes to make them walk on their own!
meanings.sent4: She managed to transistorize her thoughts, making them more efficient.
meanings.sent5: The wizard used magic to transistorize the broom, giving it the power to sweep by itself.

meanings.definition: To convert to the use of transistors.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to transistorize their production line for cost savings.
meanings.sent2: It is essential to transistorize the old system to keep up with technology.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could transistorize my car to make it run on transistors instead of gas!
meanings.sent4: The idea to transistorize the entire city with new technology was revolutionary.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's goal was to transistorize the world, bringing innovation to every corner.
